collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (7 total Queries, 7 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `category`.`name` as `category_name`, SUM(ratings.rating) as average_rating, `users`.`firstname`, `users`.`dob`, `users`.`id`, GROUP_CONCAT(ratings.jury_id SEPARATOR ", ") as jury, `nominee_details`.`nominator_photo`, `users`.`address` FROM `category` JOIN `nominee_details` ON `nominee_details`.`category_id` = `category`.`id` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id` = `nominee_details`.`nominee_id` AND `users`.`role`="2" AND `users`.`status`="Approved" JOIN `ratings` ON `ratings`.`nominee_id` = `users`.`id` WHERE `nominee_details`.`category_id` IN ('1','2','3') AND `ratings`.`is_rate_submitted` = '1' GROUP BY `ratings`.`nominee_id` ORDER BY `average_rating` DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT `category`.`name` as `category_name`, SUM(ratings.rating) as average_rating, `users`.`firstname`, `users`.`dob`, `users`.`id`, GROUP_CONCAT(ratings.jury_id SEPARATOR ", ") as jury, `nominee_details`.`nominator_photo`, `users`.`address` FROM `category` JOIN `nominee_details` ON `nominee_details`.`category_id` = `category`.`id` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id` = `nominee_details`.`nominee_id` AND `users`.`role`="2" AND `users`.`status`="Approved" JOIN `ratings` ON `ratings`.`nominee_id` = `users`.`id` WHERE `nominee_details`.`category_id` IN ('4','5') AND `ratings`.`is_rate_submitted` = '1' GROUP BY `ratings`.`nominee_id` ORDER BY `average_rating` DESC LIMIT 5

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `category`.`name` as `category_name`, SUM(ratings.rating) as average_rating, `users`.`firstname`, `users`.`dob`, `users`.`id`, GROUP_CONCAT(ratings.jury_id SEPARATOR ", ") as jury, `nominee_details`.`nominator_photo`, `users`.`address` FROM `category` JOIN `nominee_details` ON `nominee_details`.`category_id` = `category`.`id` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id` = `nominee_details`.`nominee_id` AND `users`.`role`="2" AND `users`.`status`="Approved" JOIN `ratings` ON `ratings`.`nominee_id` = `users`.`id` WHERE `nominee_details`.`category_id` IN ('4','5') AND `ratings`.`is_rate_submitted` = '1' GROUP BY `ratings`.`nominee_id` ORDER BY `average_rating` DESC LIMIT 5
